meanings.sent1: The sticker on my laptop was unremovable, no matter how hard I tried.
meanings.sent2: The unremovable stain on the carpet frustrated the homeowner.
meanings.sent3: The unremovable label on the jar made it look like a permanent decoration.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was unremovable, lighting up the room with its brightness.
meanings.sent5: The unremovable memory of their first date stayed with him forever.

meanings.sent1: The unremovable lock on the door kept everyone out of the room.
meanings.sent2: The unremovable curse haunted the village for generations.
meanings.sent3: The unremovable price tag on the gift made the recipient chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His unremovable loyalty to his friends was his most admirable trait.
meanings.sent5: The unremovable shadow of doubt lingered in her mind.
